top_articles.title: Google Patches Mysterious Chrome Zero-Day Exploited in the Wild
top_articles.summary: The Chrome zero-day does not have a CVE and it’s unclear who reported it and which browser component it affects.

top_articles.title: Fortinet Patches Critical Authentication Bypass Vulnerabilities
top_articles.summary: The two security defects impact FortiOS, FortiWeb, FortiProxy, and FortiSwitchManager with FortiCloud SSO login authentication enabled.

top_articles.title: Google fixes eighth Chrome zero-day exploited in attacks in 2025
top_articles.summary: Google has released emergency updates to fix another Chrome zero-day vulnerability exploited in the wild, marking the eighth such security flaw patched since the start of the year.

top_articles.title: Microsoft Issues Security Fixes for 56 Flaws, Including Active Exploit and Two Zero-Days

top_articles.title: UK Sanctions Russian and Chinese Firms Suspected of Being ‘Malign Actors’ in Information Warfare
top_articles.summary: Britain and its allies face escalating “hybrid threats … designed to weaken critical national infrastructure, undermine our interests and interfere in our democracies.”

top_articles.title: Microsoft Patches 57 Vulnerabilities, Three Zero-Days
top_articles.summary: Microsoft has addressed a Windows vulnerability exploited as zero-day that allows attackers to obtain System privileges.
